
configure_file(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/uuid_types.h.cmake ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/uuid_types.h )

include_directories( ${KDE4_INCLUDE_DIR} ${QT_INCLUDES}  )
